title: Mazome Soap de Aimashou!

alternative_titles.ja: マゾメスソープで逢いましょう!

synopsis:
Mitsurugi and Nagihara, the new employees at the company, are working diligently and are appreciated for their professional qualities. Mitsurugi is responsible, while Nagihara is admired for her refined behavior. However, secretly, both women work at a masochistic soapland, showing a completely different personality from what they display at work.

(Source: TMDB)
